title: Still They Came (4C175)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Skirmish: Exert an Uruk-hai who is not assigned to a skirmish to make another Uruk-hai strength +3.
Lore:	“Before the wall's foot the dead and broken were piled like shingle in a storm; ever higher rose the hideous mounds….”
Rarity:	C
